notes:
This [[Pharaoh NPCs|pharaoh]] protects the chamber where you can merge all parts of [[Helmet of the Ancients]]. Has the ability to kill a level 120 knight with 1 strong combo. For a long time, he was considered the only [[Pharaoh]] who does not drop any [[Pharaoh Rares]], until a [[Holy Scarab]] was looted. He will spawn even with players in the room; you can see some animations on the tile in the middle of the room when he is about to spawn.

{{JSpoiler|One of the Pharaohs of [[The Ancient Tombs Quest]].}}
abilities: {{Ability List|{{Melee|0-1001+|poison=7}}|{{Ability|Death Hit|0-693+|death}}|{{Ability|Life Drain Wave|0-1000+|lifedrain}}|{{Summon|Green Djinn|4}}|{{Summon|Ancient Scarab|2}}|{{Outfit|no|Ancient Scarab}}|{{Ability|Turns invisible|2 seconds|invisible}}|{{Healing|range=200-450}}}}
sounds: No mortal or undead will steal my secrets!
Come to me, my allys and underlings.
I might be trapped but not without power
Ages come, ages go. Ashmunrah remains.
name: Ashmunrah
behaviour: Malicious, will make all efforts to destroy intruders.
strategy: He uses [[melee]] attack, so use [[blocker]]s to run around him and [[Distance Fighting|distance fighters]] to fire on him. He is guarded by a [[Behemoth]] and 4 [[Ghost]]s. Note that the 4 [[Plaguethrower]]s now shoot as the fences were removed with the summer 2007 update.
